data.title: South Sudan Cities Database
data.meta_description: A database of 10 prominent cities in South Sudan.  Includes a city's latitude, longitude, state and other variables of interest. MIT license.  CSV, Excel and JSON formats. Comprehensive database available.
data.text:
Below is a list of 10 prominent cities in South Sudan. Each row includes a city's latitude, longitude, state and other variables of interest. This is a subset of all 5,077 places in South Sudan (and only some of the fields) that you'll find in our World Cities Database. We're releasing this data subset for free under an MIT license. You're free to use the data below for personal or commercial applications. The data below can be downloaded in .csv, .json, and .xlsx formats.

Notable Cities: The capital of South Sudan is Juba, which is in the state of Central Equatoria. The largest city in South Sudan is Juba, with an urban population of 459,342.
